name: Negative Steve
description:
Steve's body is split into two parts: Negative Steve and Positive Steve. He must run through all the gates to get his body back!

An endless runner made for GMTK Game Jam 2021 (theme: "joined together").

Controls

Just use SPACE, or UP ARROW, or DOWN ARROW to switch between the characters.
